# Sure Strike (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Duskblade Spells|Duskblade 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 126

*You gain a fleeting glimpse into the future, enough to guide your impending attack.*

You cast this spell immediately before you make an attack roll. You can see into the future for that attack, granting you a +1 insight bonus per three caster levels on your next attack roll.
